data.text:
Every thing is just so good to go with family and relax. Entertainment team are very good and friendly. Food is very good. Plenty of choice. 
Room service is also very good.
Pool is warm enough to enjoy in the warm weather. 
I would def recommend this hotel.
data.title: Excellent

data.text: Super great service! Everyone was super nice and helpful with the events at the resort. A lot of events and things to do around the area! Animation team was very great! Room service was also amazing. Would recommend this resort to everyone! Would defiantly come back again ðŸ˜Š
data.title: Jaz Makadi star & spa resort

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 839kyleew,

Thank you for choosing Jaz Makadi Star & Spa to spend your vacation.
We would also like to thank you for your valuable feedback. We strive to provide every guest with the perfect vacation experience and are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your visit here with us. It would be our pleasure to welcome you again soon.

Kind regards, your Jaz Makadi Star & Spa Team.
owner_response.author: Amr Tarek

data.text: Animation team are fantastic and amazing!! So attentive and helpful. Always there to make sure you are having a brilliant holiday, there are all so friendly and talkative. Asking you how your day is and how your holiday is going. Absolutely amazing with young children, so friendly and nice.
data.title: Amazing animation team!

data.text: Great family friendly hotel (4 stars). Great food and animation team. Special kidos to Lil, Omar and all other people working here to make our stay pleasant. They always happy to go extra miles for guests. Not too busy hotel which is a plusâ€¦..
data.title: Great 4 stars hotel with great people and animation team
